## sequence() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
sequence: <
  const A extends readonly any[],
  I = GetSequenceInput<A>,
  O = GetSequenceOutput<A>,
>(
  actions: BlockRetainType<A> & A & ValidInputOutputSequence<I, O, A>,
  mode?: ExecutionMode,
) => Block<I, O>;
```
